song_lyrics: Mune pragaṭ maḷyā mune pragaṭ maḷyā,
Tan tāp ṭaḷyā tan tāp ṭaḷyā,
Naṭnāgar sukh dīdhu nautam nemthī... Mune
Āj am upar karuṇā āṇī... Mune
Evā avani par avatār dhare... Mune
Āj bhāgya māru thayu ati bhārī... Mune
Devānand kahe mūrtimā man oḷyu... Mune
title: Mune pragaṭ maḷyā mune pragaṭ maḷyā

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-9037: Sadguru Devanand Swami

Category: Murtina Pad
